document.masterDocTitle: World Catalogue of the Druid Flies (Diptera: Schizophora: Clusiidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: World Catalogue of the Druid Flies (Diptera: Schizophora: Clusiidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Calometopon Frey 1960 : 19 (as subgenus). Type species,
Calometopon nobile Frey 1960
, by original designation. Gender neuter. Frey 1960 : 19 [family and genus revision, key to species, Indoaustralia, catalogue, world];
Papp et al . 2006
: 190 [identified and unidentified species, Thailand ]; Sasakawa 2009 : 40 [citation]; Lonsdale 2016 : 5 [as synonym of
Allometopon
].
